kvkk.title: Privacy Policy (KVKK)
kvkk.intro: At QuickToPDF, we highly value user privacy. Your personal data is never stored, shared, or disclosed to third parties.
kvkk.detailedTitle: Personal Data Protection and Privacy Policy (KVKK)

long.title: 1. Purpose and Scope
long.desc: This policy sets out the principles for the protection of personal data processed on the QuickToPDF platform, in accordance with the Turkish Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

long.title: 2. Definition of Personal Data
long.desc: According to Article 3 of the KVKK, personal data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. QuickToPDF does not request direct personal data such as name, email, or IP address; only temporary technical data required for file conversion is processed.

long.title: 3. Principles of Data Processing
long.desc: In accordance with Article 4 of the KVKK and Article 5 of the GDPR, personal data is processed lawfully, fairly, accurately, and, where necessary, kept up to date, for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes, and is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it is processed.

long.title: 4. Purposes of Data Processing
long.desc: Personal data is processed only for the provision of the service, ensuring system security, statistical analysis, and fulfillment of legal obligations. User data is not used for marketing or shared with third parties.

long.title: 5. Data Retention Period
long.desc: According to Article 7 of the KVKK and Article 17 of the GDPR, personal data is retained only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it is processed. Uploaded files and temporary data are deleted automatically within 5 minutes after the conversion process is completed.

long.title: 6. Data Security
long.desc: In accordance with Article 12 of the KVKK and Article 32 of the GDPR, QuickToPDF takes all necessary technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of personal data. Servers are hosted in secure data centers, and data transmission is encrypted (SSL/TLS).

long.title: 7. Transfer of Personal Data
long.desc: According to Articles 8 and 9 of the KVKK and Articles 44-50 of the GDPR, personal data is not transferred to third parties or abroad except for legal obligations. In case of a legal request, only the necessary information is provided to the relevant authorities.

long.title: 8. User Rights (KVKK Art. 11, GDPR Art. 15-22)
long.desc: Users have the right to learn whether their personal data is processed, to request information, to learn whether it is used in accordance with its purpose, to know the third parties to whom it is transferred, to request correction or deletion, to object to processing, and to request compensation for damages.

long.title: 9. Cookies and Analytics
long.desc: QuickToPDF may use cookies and anonymous analytics tools to improve user experience and perform statistical analysis. This data is not used for personal identification.

long.title: 10. Legal Basis and Updates
long.desc: This policy is prepared in accordance with the KVKK, GDPR, and relevant legislation. QuickToPDF may update its privacy policy in line with legal requirements and service changes. Updates become effective as soon as they are published on the site.

long.title: 11. Explicit Consent and Exceptions
long.desc: According to Articles 5 and 6 of the KVKK and Article 6 of the GDPR, personal data cannot be processed without the explicit consent of the data subject, except in cases specified by law (e.g., legal obligation, performance of a contract).

long.title: 12. Application and Contact
long.desc: For any application, request, or complaint regarding your personal data, you can contact us at info@quicktopdf.com. Your applications will be answered within 30 days in accordance with Article 13 of the KVKK and Article 12 of the GDPR.

kvkk.note: The highest level of security is provided for your data. Your operations with QuickToPDF are completely safe and confidential.
